title: Ping Issues

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body:
Hey it's me again,

Same problem again, absolutely no idea why this happens but it happens randomly maybe once or twice a week. 
Ping starts at 300 and keeps rising. ended up with ping of 1000+ roughly at 1300 ms.
I've been moved to low prio que few days ago, now completed, but in it said it gave me a link for when i experience lags, but when i go to it, message appears stating that there are no lag issues in my area... seriously? im getting pings of more than a thousand!!!

Please help,

attached screen shot of in game pings in the link.
